content.p: Our mission is to understand lightning and its interaction with modern technology Lightning Technology Research Centre builds upon a long term collaboration between the University of Nottingham and BAE Systems. The award of UoN RPA Partnership Grant enabled this collaboration to broaden and include major research centres and industry groups in UK. The existing partnership includes: The University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0) 115 95 15593 email: ana.vukovic@nottingham.ac.uk
